      • transmit

        public void transmit(Mail mail)
              throws QueueStorageException
        Description copied from interface: Transmitter
        Sends mail asynchronously. It returns immediately. If necessary it queues the mail and retries periodically.
        Specified by:
        transmit in interface Transmitter
        Throws:
        QueueStorageException
